sentences.english: Vice Premier Zhang Dejiang has gone to the Zhangjialing mine to supervise the rescue operation.

sentences.english: Vice Premier Zhang Dejiang of the State Council also attended the meeting.

sentences.english: Vice-Prime Minister Zhang Dejiang visited the crash scene today to help set up an investigation team.
sentences.chinese: 國務院副總理張德江今天率領調查團抵達事故現場。

sentences.english: Vice Premier Zhang Dejiang has gone to the Wangjialing mine to supervise the rescue operation.
